name: Mystique Soup
description: A drink made from Grainfruit. Originally invented as a type of medicine by a certain shaman of the Masters of the Night-Wind, the recipe has been altered over time and is now a common drink at social gatherings.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Mystique Soup
suspicious.description: A drink made from Grainfruit. One sip and all your taste buds begin to tingle. It's almost like an "endless aftertaste," for the flavor is so intense that it lingers on the tip of your tongue, and even drinking water cannot wash it away.
suspicious.effect: A little surprise from the Masters of the Night-Wind.

normal.name: Mystique Soup
normal.description: A drink made from Grainfruit. Originally invented as a type of medicine by a certain shaman of the Masters of the Night-Wind, the recipe has been altered with the passage of time and is now a common drink at social gatherings.
normal.effect: A little surprise from the Masters of the Night-Wind.

delicious.name: Delicious Mystique Soup
delicious.description: A drink made from Grainfruit. The cup is full of still, bright liquid, with the magnificent hues of a gemstone with a stunning gradient. Its subtle fragrance and delicate sweetness combine to evoke the mysteries of an ancient tribe, leaving those that partake yearning for more.
delicious.effect: A little surprise from the Masters of the Night-Wind.
